## Data Cleaning

```{r}
# load library
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)

# read text_df and data cleaning attempt
text_df_url <-"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/geedoubledee/data607_project3/main/text_df.csv"
text_data <- read.csv(text_df_url)
head(text_data)

text_data1 <- lapply(text_data, function(x) str_replace_all(x, "[^[:alnum:]]", ""))
text_data2 <- lapply(text_data1, function(y) str_replace_all(y, "[[:punct:]]", ""))
text_data3 <- lapply(text_data2, function (z) str_replace_all(z, "[^A-Za-z]", ""))

head(text_data3)

```
